description: Anonymous. Fols. 81; 22.8 x 16.3 cm.; written surface 20 x 14.5 cm.; 23-27 lines to page; on glazed European paper; in naskhi; with catchwords. A collection of declarations and circular letters of patriarchs, bishops and priests concerning lawsuits and petitions submitted to the Council of Antioch and the answers to them. All pertain to the Syrian, Maronite, Greek Orthodox and Greek Catholic Churches and cover the period A.D. 1807-10. Beg.: صورة منشور قدسه. المجد لله دائما اغابىوس برحمة الله Colophon: مقدمىن ذواتنا عبىدًا کلىىن الخضوع لنىافتکم. حررفي 29 تشرىن ثاني سنة 1810 حساب شرقي First five folios of smaller size. MS in good condition; Arabic binding. Probably from later XlXth century. Acquired from Bārūdī, Beirūt, A.D. 1925.
subject: Canon law—Eastern churches
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
